name: Generic Flapping Game
description:
Jump using w,  the up arrow key,  the spacebar or left clicking!

A very simple early prototype of a flappy bird clone. I suppose this is one of those learning projects and I absolutely do not guarantee that this will go anywhere (though I might consider it). So far this is extremely unfinished and awful. There are hundreds of these on the platform, and I really only uploaded this so that I can have a bit of a timeline on versions of the game. To call this an MVP (Minimal Viable Product) is quite a stretch.
